means: [女子名] 盖尔绰号，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“快活的，粗暴的”(jovial,rowdy)
[女子名] 盖尔来源于日耳曼语人名，含义是“快活的”(cheerful)，或“陌生人，异乡人”(stranger,foreigner)
[女子名] 盖尔职业名称，监狱看守，来源于古北方法语，含义是“监狱”(jail)
[女子名] 盖尔来源于古英语，含义是“欢乐的”(gay)
尿苷二磷酸-半乳糖-4-表异构酶
galactose epimerase 半乳糖表位酶

word_mean: 曾称“大风”。蒲福风级的八级风, 风速为17.2—20.7m/s。

sentence.Network_en: A gale was blowing and the sea was choppy.
sentence.Network_cn: 狂风大作，海面上波浪起伏。

sentence.Network_en: The wind was still rising, approach-ing a force nine gale.
sentence.Network_cn: 风力仍在增强，接近9级大风。

sentence.Network_en: In a severe gale the ship split in two.
sentence.Network_cn: 在一次大风中，船断成了两截。

...gabriel　加布力尔　希伯来　上帝的男仆；上帝的力量是很力的。gale　加尔　爱尔兰　唱歌；陌生人。gary　盖理　条顿　带枪矛的人；猎犬。.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: perhaps related to Old Norse galinn 'mad, frantic'

entry.def: A gale is a very strong wind.

example.ex: ...forecasts of fierce gales over the next few days.
example.tran: 预报未来几天有超强大风

entry.def: You can refer to the loud noise made by a lot of people all laughing at the same time as a gale of laughter or gales of laughter.

example.ex: This was greeted with gales of laughter from the audience.
example.tran: 观众对此报以阵阵笑声。

means.word_mean: 1. a strong wind moving 45-90 knots; force 7 to 10 on Beaufort scale

sentences.en: We got our roof blown off in the gale last night.
sentences.cn: 昨夜的大风把我们的房顶给掀掉了。

sentences.en: I could hear gales of laughter coming from downstairs.
sentences.cn: 我能听到来自楼下的阵阵笑声。
